name: Planet Red
description:
Year is 3055. Evolving Technology is no longer regulated. Humans have reached beyond the STARS, but with a big cost of nature.

Now Planet Blue (Earth) has turned into an unsafe place for humans. They must seek a new planet to survive. Good news is, they have found a new Planet called Planet RED.

Although humans have reached a new planet, the troubles are yet to come. The Planet is full of alien creatures which are deadly for humans & their Environment. Humans now have to invade Planet RED to secure their future existence. They are planning a full scale Invasion on the planet. The Pre-Invasion Plan is divided into 3 parts:

Phase 1. Secure a Landing site & the entrance of the Factory.
Phase 2. Secure the Factory. This will produce unlimited Oxygen & Energy for the humans.
Phase 3. Detonate a Nuke in the core of Planet RED. The chain reaction will create an Atmosphere which will hold the Oxygen. After that, the Full scale Invasion will begin.

A Space Commando Unity has been sent to Planet RED to execute the Pre-Invasion Plan. You’re one of the members of the Commando team. You are not going to battle alone, you are taking with you the hope for mankind's future existence. Happy Hunting . . . . .
